Uses of Package
co.codecraft.jcircuit

  • Classes in co.codecraft.jcircuit used by co.codecraft.jcircuit 
    Class and Description
    Circuit
    A Circuit proxies a code path, action, or feature that needs to be gracefully degraded or disabled in some circumstances.
    Circuit.Listener
    Receive notifications just after the circuit changes state (e.g., from CLOSED to OPEN).
    CircuitBreaker
    Encapsulates the circuit breaker design pattern described by Michael Nygard in Release It! See "Don't Forget the Circuit Breakers" for a discussion.
    TimedRatioPolicy
    Provides a simple transition policy where all rules are expressed in terms of ratios of good and bad pulses, calculated at regularly timed intervals.
    TimedRatioPolicy.Builder
    A convenience class to make constructor parameters less opaque.
    TransitionPolicy
    Used by a CircuitBreaker to control the manner and timing of transitions in its Circuit.
